content: Hello, I'm relatively new to both Rust and programming. Hoping to contribute Rust project somewhere down the line. Thanks for having me.
Welcome ! What are you interested in ? There are probably already crates you could look for your domains of interests to learn more about Rust and programming :smile:
Thanks! My background is in Javascript web dev so I guess it would make sense to enter Rust through that domain.
There is https://crates.io/crates/wasm-bindgen if you are curious about webassembly and using Rust and JS in the same project
(There are others too, I just took the most used crate)

(Stealing this from @Joshua Nelson)
You might be interested in contributing to docs.rs too
Or crates.io; it uses Ember on the frontend.
You can find both of them under the rust-lang org on GitHub.
